name: Woo Send Email
author: laboratorio d'Avanguardia

sections.description:
Send custom email message to your WooCommerce customers directly from WC Orders Admin Page.
Select a list of orders, compose your message and send it via email to all selected customers.

The custom email messages have the same header and footer of all your WooCommerce email messages.

You can send a message to customers who bought a certain product. Try using our plugin Search order by product SKU for WooCommerce to select orders that includes that product.

Translations in your language

  • English
  • Italian (it_IT)
  • Our plugin is fully WPML Compatible.

Support

If you find any issue, let us know here!

Contributions

Help us to translate the plugin in your language. You can do it here.
sections.installation:
Steps to install this plugin.

Be sure you’re running WooCommerce 2.0+

  1. In the downloaded zip file, there is a folder with name ‘woo-send-email’
  2. Upload the ‘woo-send-email’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Read the usage instructions in the description.
sections.changelog:
0.3 – 2023/06/09

  • Verifica compatibilità con WooCommerce 7.7.2
  • Verifica compatibilità con WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS)

0.2 – 2017/04/26

  • TinyMCE editor added

0.1 – 2017/04/21

  • Initial version of plugin

screenshots.caption: Apply any filter to your orders and press the "Send a message" button.

Write the email message body, specify a subject, select orders whose customers you want to send a message, then press the "Send a message" button below, and wait until sending is completed. If you want to test how your message is, you can check the "Send a message for testing" option, and receive the message at your mailbox.
A screenshot of the message received.
